meanings.definition: Relating to or contained in the Bible.
meanings.sent1: The church displayed beautiful biblical paintings on its walls.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading biblical stories to her children before bedtime.
meanings.sent3: The biblical flood seemed like a lot of water for just one boat.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of biblical events was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The biblical teachings were etched in her memory forever.

meanings.definition: In accordance with the teachings of the Bible.
meanings.sent1: Their wedding ceremony was a truly biblical affair.
meanings.sent2: Living a biblical life meant following the Ten Commandments.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his friend's biblical diet consisted only of manna.
meanings.sent4: The impact of his words was biblical, resonating with everyone present.
meanings.sent5: The biblical principles guided their every decision.
